languages.text: "Я все понимаю, шерин, и все же... горюю об Идире. Мне нравилась ее компания, да сохранит Великий грешную душу этой болтливой касхи".
"I understand all that, shereen, and yet... I mourn her. I enjoyed Idira's company, may the Exalted One preserve that gobby kaskha's tainted soul."
languages.original_text: "Я все понимаю, шерин, и все же... горюю об Идире. Мне нравилась ее компания, да сохранит Великий грешную душу этой болтливой касхи".

traits.locale_text: "I understand all that, shereen, and yet... I mourn her. I enjoyed Idira's company, may the Exalted One preserve that gobby kaskha's tainted soul."
"I understand all that, shereen, and yet... I mourn her. I enjoyed Idira's company, may the Exalted One preserve that gobby kaskha's tainted soul."
"I understand all that, shereen, and yet... I mourn her. I enjoyed Idira's company, may the Exalted One preserve that gobby kaskha's tainted soul."
"I understand all that, shereen, and yet... I mourn her. I enjoyed Idira's company, may the Exalted One preserve that gobby kaskha's tainted soul."

languages.text: “我理解你所做的一切，亲爱的，但是……我为她哀悼。我很喜欢伊迪拉的陪伴，愿至高无上的神皇保佑那个小贱人被混沌玷污的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "I understand all that, shereen, and yet... I mourn her. I enjoyed Idira's company, may the Exalted One preserve that gobby kaskha's tainted soul."

traits.locale_text: “我理解你所做的一切，亲爱的，但是……我为她哀悼。我很喜欢伊迪拉的陪伴，愿至高无上的神皇保佑那个小贱人被混沌玷污的灵魂。”

languages.text: « Je comprends bien, shereen, et pourtant... je pleure Idira. Sa compagnie n'était pas si déplaisante, que l'Exalté préserve l'âme impure de cette kaskha et sa grande gueule. »
languages.original_text: "I understand all that, shereen, and yet... I mourn her. I enjoyed Idira's company, may the Exalted One preserve that gobby kaskha's tainted soul."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends bien, shereen, et pourtant... je pleure Idira. Sa compagnie n'était pas si déplaisante, que l'Exalté préserve l'âme impure de cette kaskha et sa grande gueule. »

languages.text: «Lo entiendo perfectamente, shereen, pero... la echo de menos. Disfrutaba de la compañía de Idira, que el Exaltado preserve el alma de esa kaskha mugrienta».
languages.original_text: "I understand all that, shereen, and yet... I mourn her. I enjoyed Idira's company, may the Exalted One preserve that gobby kaskha's tainted soul."

traits.locale_text: «Lo entiendo perfectamente, shereen, pero... la echo de menos. Disfrutaba de la compañía de Idira, que el Exaltado preserve el alma de esa kaskha mugrienta».

languages.text: 「それはわかるけど、シェリーン…アタシはイディラを悼むよ。アイツが仲間で楽しかったんだ、エグザルテッド・ワンよ、あの元気な子の汚れた魂をお守りください」
languages.original_text: "I understand all that, shereen, and yet... I mourn her. I enjoyed Idira's company, may the Exalted One preserve that gobby kaskha's tainted soul."

traits.locale_text: 「それはわかるけど、ダーリン…アタシはイディラを悼むよ。アイツが仲間で楽しかったんだ、エグザルテッド・ワンよ、あの元気な子の汚れた魂をお守りください」

languages.text: "Das ist mir alles bewusst, Shereen, und doch ... trauere ich um sie. Ich mochte Idiras Gesellschaft, möge der Erhabene die verdorbene Seele dieser vorlauten Kaskha bewahren."
languages.original_text: "I understand all that, shereen, and yet... I mourn her. I enjoyed Idira's company, may the Exalted One preserve that gobby kaskha's tainted soul."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist mir alles bewusst, Shereen, und doch ... trauere ich um sie. Ich mochte Idiras Gesellschaft, möge der Erhabene die verdorbene Seele dieser vorlauten Kaskha bewahren."

languages.original_text: "I understand all that, shereen, and yet... I mourn her. I enjoyed Idira's company, may the Exalted One preserve that gobby kaskha's tainted soul."

languages.text: "Tüm bunları anlıyorum şirinim ama... Yasını tutuyorum işte. İdira'nın arkadaşlığından keyif alıyordum. Görkemli, o geveze kaşkanın lekeli ruhuna rahmet etsin."
languages.original_text: "I understand all that, shereen, and yet... I mourn her. I enjoyed Idira's company, may the Exalted One preserve that gobby kaskha's tainted soul."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm bunları anlıyorum şirinim ama... Yasını tutuyorum işte. İdira'nın arkadaşlığından keyif alıyordum. Görkemli, o geveze kaşkanın lekeli ruhuna rahmet etsin."
